issue.title: StructBuilder UnmarshalJSON does not handle missing optional fields
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16502](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16502). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When calling array.StructBuilder.UnmarshalJSON with a JSON object that has missing optional fields, it fails to decode the JSON object properly and will panic - but it's a common behavior to drop empty/null fields from the JSON
